org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Interface PowerVmAllocationPolicy

  • All Superinterfaces:
    VmAllocationPolicy
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PowerVmAllocationPolicyMigration
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface PowerVmAllocationPolicy
extends VmAllocationPolicy
    An interface to be implemented by VM allocation policy for Power-aware VMs.
    Author:
    Manoel Campos da Silva Filho
